overview: Have you ever got lost in one of the cit√©s of Limburg? Then this is probably the first thing you heard: "wa make?" The most frequently asked question among friends and neighbours. With friends it rather means: how are you? What are you doing; or just, do you actually already have a job? But both Georgette and Meryem are now asking each other: wa make? Do we always say how we are really doing? In this comedy show, Erhan finds out how we interact with each other. Is this different in West Flanders than in Limburg?
title: Wa make? - Erhan Demirci
